identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a bold, edgy, high-performance fitness dashboard that breaks away from generic SaaS aesthetics. Dark mode only.
key_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix tactical ops aesthetics with sports broadcast visuals.
Emotion First: The UI should feel like a high-end gym at nightâ€”focused, gritty, and electric.
Content is King: Data clarity is paramount for the leaderboard.
Contrast: High-vis accents against deep obsidian backgrounds.

headings.usage: Page titles, Team names, Station names, Timer digits

body.usage: Inputs, Labels, Table data, dense text

usage_rules: Backgrounds must be #0A0A0A or #121212. Never pure black #000000 unless for OLED optimization.
Use Volt Green (#CCFF00) for active states, primary buttons, and 'Active Wave' indicators.
Use Cool Gray (#A3A9B2) for secondary info and table headers.

admin_panel.container_style: Cardless or minimal cards with 1px borders
admin_panel.spacing: Compact (gap-4) for data density, but large touch targets (h-12) for inputs

leaderboard.row_style: Large, distinctive rows with massive typography

variants.default: bg-[#CCFF00] text-black hover:bg-[#B3E600] font-bold uppercase tracking-wide rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg]
variants.outline: border border-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white/10 hover:border-white font-medium rounded-none uppercase tracking-wide skew-x-[-10deg]

Input.style: bg-[#121212] border border-[#27272A] text-white focus:border-[#CCFF00] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#CCFF00] h-12 rounded-sm placeholder:text-neutral-600

Table.header_style: text-[#A3A9B2] uppercase tracking-wider font-semibold text-xs border-b border-[#27272A]

textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background (opacity 0.03)
Scanlines overlay for the leaderboard (optional, low opacity)
effects: Pulse: css animation for the 'Active Wave' badge
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (default) or Phosphor Icons (for a techier look)

motion.list_reorder: Framer Motion layout animations (spring stiffness 300, damping 30)
motion.micro_interactions: Scale down on click (0.98), color shift on hover

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid dark colors with subtle noise.
Do NOT use rounded corners larger than 4px (rounded-sm). Keep it sharp and tactical.
Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all numbers and headings to save horizontal space and increase impact.
The Leaderboard must be readable from 10 meters away. Use text-4xl or larger for ranks/times.
